title.rendered: Class of 2025 Commencement Ceremony on June 27

content.rendered:
The Class of 2025 Commencement Ceremony will be held on Friday, June 27, 2025, at 9:00 am, at the Saratoga Performing Arts Center. There are no tickets required and no restrictions on the number of guests — everyone is welcome to attend.

If you are unable to attend in-person, click here to watch a livestream of the ceremony.

Congratulations to the Class of 2025!
